body.name: Aigostar Programmable Coffee Maker, 8 Cup Coffee Maker with Glass Carafe, Auto Pause Small Coffee Maker, 24H Timer and Auto Keep Warm Drip Coffee Maker with Permanent Filter for Home Office, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 52 mins
features: 🔥24 Hours Timer Programmable Coffee Maker - This coffee maker with 24H timer function which allows you to set your coffee maker in advance and wake up to enjoy freshly brewed coffee. Simple ON/OFF button to start brewing and turn off the brewer. PROG button: Press to pre-set the auto-brew time. Set time with Min and Hour buttons. The controls are intuitive, easy to program and the indicator light and LED display make it easy to read and use.

🔥Auto Pause & Keep Warm - The coffee maker comes with anti-drip feature, interrupt the brew cycle and pour a cup of coffee without making a mess. It ensure your coffee maker and kitchen counter-top remain clean and tidy. Also the handy keep warm function allows you to keep your coffee at a consistent temperature and ready to drink when you are. After your coffee pot has brewed a fresh carafe of coffee, the warming plate will retain heat, keeping the temperature for up to 40 minutes and then auto turned off.

🔥Reusable Filter - The glass coffee maker comes with a removable cone filter and a basket which is washable and reusable. The cone filter is considered to brew better coffee than basket filter. Also they are dishwasher safe. Removable brew filter basket and glass carafe can be cleaned in the dishwasher, saving time and effort in your life. Easy to view water window allows you to see the exact water level for no overflows. Size dimension: 7.2x8.9x12 inches.

🔥Large Capacity, Quick Brewing - You'll love the convenience of the Aigostar drip coffee pot, which allows you to brew up to 8-10(max) cups of coffee thanks to its high temperature resistant glass carafe with a 42-ounce capacity. The Aigostar drip coffee pot boasts a high-powered 800W motor, enabling quick brewing in just 1 minute. Furthermore, the pot features an easy-pour, no-drip spout for added convenience. Maintaining a compact and modern style, the 8-cup brewing capacity of this coffee maker is perfect for a small family.

🔥Easy Cleaning & Compact Sized - This aigostar coffee maker features a simple design that allows for easy cleaning. The parts exposed to loose grounds and water can be easily removed from the base, disassembled, and placed in the dishwasher. However, it is important to note that the electrical base, power cord, and plug of the dishwasher-safe coffee maker should never be immersed in water or other liquids.
❤️Satisfied Customer Service - If there has any problem with your 8 cups coffee maker, please feel free to send us a message for a solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised by this affordable coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a smaller coffee pot for our travel trailer since the previous one was pretty big and counter space is limited. I thought that this was a happy medium between a single cup maker and a 12 cup. It fits very nicely on the counter and under the hood of the stove. I had low expectations since it is inexpensive, but was pleasantly surprised. It pours very cleanly. My previous coffee pot often dripped when pouring, especially if I poured quickly. The carafe is designed very well for a drip-free pour. It comes with a reusable filter, so that you don't have to use paper products, or if you run out of filters you have this one. It is cone shaped, which I think works much better if you're just making a few cups of coffee than the flat bottomed ones. The coffee brewed at a faster speed than the Mr. Coffee coffee pot but tastes excellent. The lid securely fastens down, preventing situations like things not being pushed down all the way and the water going into the area where the grinds are but not dripping down into the pot and making a big mess. A not so great feature is that there is a bright blue screen. I threw out the manual thinking I wouldn't need it and now we can't figure out how to set the time. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it over my Mr. Coffee coffee pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This coffee maker is user friendly.
reviews.reviewText: I love love the size of it. It's really convenient for my Fiancé and I. I have fallen in love with the automated time feature. This was a great buy and the price was perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, works fine
reviews.reviewText: It's a good basic drip coffee maker. The coffee came out tasting great and I needed it quick for a party we were hosting. Amazon came through again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: I needed to replace my 4-cup coffee maker and I found this one. Once I found the right ratio of water to coffee it has been wonderful. I can also still make 4-cups when I need to. I really like the programmable aspect of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not happy at all. After just 2 months of use, it started leaking clear water through the bottom, so every time I fill it, creates a mess on the counter. Since I can’t return it, I’ll throw it away and replace it with a better quality product. Also, the flavor is not as good as other coffee machines I use, for the same coffee brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect basic coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love my coffee but not ready to purchase a fancy coffee maker, and this little guy is perfect for my basic coffee needs. Programmable for those early mornings and comes with a pretty good reusable filer. I'm glad I chose this one over other budget friendly models.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Brewing fine, warmer not so
reviews.reviewText: Programmable brewing works fine,; 2 hour warming cycle does not keep coffee hot, only slightly warm. Have to heat coffee in microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smaller footprint and makes tasty coffee
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a small kitchen, and we are pleased with the footprint on the limited counter-space. We're also happy with the quality of coffee -- but to be honest we believe the beans make the bigger difference than the maker, so as long as we are using fresh beans of high quality we're happy. We highly recommend.
